# Commercial & Residential Property Insurance Lawyers

Home  Commercial & Residential Property Insurance Lawyers

## Do I have a business or residential property insurance dispute?

If your insurance company has unreasonably denied, delayed, or disputed your
business or home insurance claim, then you may have a dispute.

When a policyholder submits a claim to their insurance company, they expect
the company will act in good faith and honor their contract.

Property insurance disputes arise when an insurance company denies a valid
claim, often without any explanation.

Insurance companies make more money when policyholders do not file claims and
when the company delays payment of claims or fails to pay claims submitted
under policies.

The insurance recovery lawyers at Raizner Slania have extensive experience
working with clients who have been underpaid, paid late, or wrongfully denied
by their insurance companies.

We have succeeded in recovering what our clients were entitled to under their
policies, so let us help you, too.

To discuss your situation with our team of trusted experts, contact Raizner
Slania today for a free consultation.

Commercial Property Damage __

Residential Property Damage __

Business Insurance Disputes __

## Why was my insurance claim denied?

Many insurance companies are for-profit businesses, and it helps them be more
financially successful when they avoid or delay paying claims.

The insurance company will employ many tactics and tricks to mitigate their
losses, including offering a low-ball settlement or wrongfully denying the
claim.

To avoid paying claims, the insurance company can categorize your property
damage as exceeding the scope of your insurance policy or falling within
exclusions to your coverage.

Although insurance companies should honor valid insurance claims, our
attorneys have witnessed instances where companies have underpaid claims or
simply refused to pay.

At Raizner Slania, we understand these denials can have devastating financial
effects on claimants whose business or residential properties require urgent
repair.

## How can a lawyer help me file a claim dispute?

Our experienced lawyers at Raizner Slania can examine your policy to determine
your coverage and any payments you may be owed.

Insurance companies have made the process of filing and collecting on
insurance claims a daunting task, hoping that most policyholders will abandon
their claims, especially after being delayed or denied.

## Damage caused by natural events? We’ll handle it.

When you’re facing the overwhelming task of repairing costly damages after a
traumatic event, the last thing you want to deal with is an uncooperative
insurance company.

The normal insurance runaround gets exacerbated in the aftermath of hurricanes
and other catastrophic events because a large number of policyholders are
making claims at the same time.

Whether you run a business or own a home, Raizner Slania will handle insurance
claim disputes for damage caused by a variety of weather conditions and
natural disasters.

## Commercial Property Damage

If your commercial building sustained damage to the interior, roof,  siding,
and/or windows during any of the events listed below, then please contact us
today.

  * Fire
  * Hail
  * Hurricanes
  * Tornados
  * Water
  * Wind
  * Ice Storms
  * Vandalism & Theft

## Residential Property Damage

If you own or occupy a house, condominium, or townhome, Raizner Slania will
help you claim compensation from difficult insurance companies for damage
caused by:

  * Fire
  * Hail
  * Hurricanes
  * Tornados
  * Wind

## Contact an Insurance Recovery Lawyer Today

To discuss your property insurance dispute with an experienced lawyer, please
contact Raizner Slania today for a free consultation.

We’ve helped hundreds of Texas clients protect their investment and recover
what they were entitled to under their insurance policy – now let us help you,
too.

### LET OUR TEAM HELP YOU

or call us at **844-554-9099**
